ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to read the User Binding resources from.

UserSid.description: The SID of the [User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/user-resource) with the User Binding resources to read.  See [push notification configuration](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration) for more info.

BindingType.description: The push technology used by the User Binding resources to read. Can be: `apn`, `gcm`, or `fcm`.  See [push notification configuration](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/push-notification-configuration) for more info.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
